page.title: 18TOURISM 2
page.content: archaeological discoveries in Britain. The people who lived date from The Stone Age to the 16th century. Many tourists are interested in the local boat-the Ness Yoal which resembles a Viking longship. If you are a keen birdwatcher then one of the best places to go is Sumburgh.There are many interesting species of birds,especially around the coast.In Sumburgh there are two very nice beaches. Our area has 2 hotels : Sumburgh ; Meadovale and 2 bus stations: Bolts ; Leasks. Sumburgh airport is large for Shetland. Tourists have increased in numbers especially foreigners thanks to the Norona. Sumburgh is a good place for hill walking and nature. So our area has many varied attractions for visitors.
